description: The familiar tastes of espresso, vodka, and Kahlua won't give you a spook. Enjoy this festive drink as an excuse to stay up late after some tricks are pulled!
name: Easy Espresso Martini

recipeInstructions.name: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice and pour in the espresso, vodka, and Kahlua. Shake until chilled.
recipeInstructions.text: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice and pour in the espresso, vodka, and Kahlua. Shake until chilled.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour into two chilled glasses. Garnish with a few coffee beans.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour into two chilled glasses. Garnish with a few coffee beans.
